install.name: Single Sign-On Helper
install.author: Sam Moffatt
install.description: Single Sign-On Helper to initiate an SSO attempt

param.name: ip_blacklist
param.label: IP Blacklist
param.description: IP addresses to ignore for Single Sign OnIP addresses to ignore for Single Sign On (newline seperated)

param.name: override
param.label: Override logged in user
param.description: If a user is already logged in, SSO will not attempt to log them in

param.name: nexthop
param.label: Login Redirection URL
param.description: URL to redirect to upon login. Keep in mind that if the request wasn't a GET request then this will be ignored!
